name: Archeologists VS Mummies
description:
you are an archeologist exploring the inside of an Egyptian pyramid, when you stumble into a hoard of living mummies!
how  to protect yourself?
you must place down weapons by clicking on a tile- but you can only do so if the tile is lit by the changing rays of sun
collect coins, shoot at mummies and have fun!

https://rmm-maz.000webhostapp.com/buildWebgl/index.html
